1322311122.content:
Although Summer had a reputation of being the most resourceful and wilful of the group (hence her status as impromptu leader) these characteristics would count for little if somebody so much as dragged a lone finger across her bare sole. Her incredibly ticklish feet were her greatest weakness and she knew she'd have to keep Jaime from getting at them if she was to win this. The thought of losing filled her with incredulity; how could her friends possibly see her as a leader if she was tickled into submission by a 'subordinate' and then reduced to a restrained, giggling mess alongside her little sister? As she took her place opposite Jaime on the mat, Summer resolved to strike quickly and to hopefully catch her opponent off guard. After all, she thought reassuringly, Jaime was known to be the most reserved of the team and was therefore more likely to hesitate at a crucial moment.

"On your marks" recited Chris. "Get set. Go!"

Summer and Jaime circled each other ponderously for a time, each probing the other's movements and poised for a counterattack. Then, without warning, Summer pounced, grabbing Jaime around the waist and sending both girls tumbling to the ground. They grappled and rolled around the mat, each girl giggling softly as they attempted to prod and pinch each other's sides. Eventually Summer came out on top, sitting on Jaime's upper legs to pin her body to the floor. Triumphantly, she reached down and began to squeeze Jaime's sides, causing her opponent to dissolve into a cascade of laughter.

"Well? Ready to give up?" Summer asked sweetly as she slipped her hand beneath Jaime's shirt and continued to knead the girl's bare lower belly.

"NeheheheheheheveheheherhahahaHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" squealed Jaime as she tossed her head from side to side and struck at the ground fruitlessly with her fists.

Summer began to dig into Jaime's lower ribcage with her nails, causing the latter to thrash around more energetically as her cheeks began to grow flushed with laughter. Chris and Mouse watched curiously from the other side of the room; Chris brightly pondering who her second victim would be and Mouse wondering who would be sharing in her torture, not that it made any difference.

Jaime, meanwhile, was beginning to lose it. She knew that she couldn't take much more and had to act immediately if she was to have any chance. She was so ticklish around the waist that she had temporarily forgotten that her arms were still free; Summer had neglected to secure them with her legs when she had gotten on top. An uncharacteristic oversight by the cunning and quick-thinking sleuth but Jaime was not about to question that now. She knew reaching up tickle Summer's own belly would expose her underarms and that would surely spell the end for Jaime. Focusing with all her might to momentarily forget about the barrage of tickling, she reached behind Summer and grabbed at the only area she could reach: Summer's thigh.

The outcome was instantaneous. Summer jerked, let out a surprised shriek and reeled back as if she'd been given an electric shock. Even she hadn't been aware that her thighs were so sensitive. Frantically, Jaime tried to take full advantage, continuing to squeeze Summer's thigh until the elder Salt sister lost balance and was tipped onto her side.

Finally free from the tickling and from the weight of Summer's body, Jaime wasted little time. She twisted to disentangle herself from Summer's collapsed body. Summer herself darted a hand back towards Jaime's belly, hoping to regain the advantage but the other girl managed to get a hold of both Summer's wrists. Summer yanked free and managed to sneak a few pokes to Jaime's sides.

"Hehehehehehenotthihihihihistihihihihihime" Jaime managed to articulate through a fresh stream of giggles as she skittered her own nails across Summer's navel, causing the latter to drop her hands and double over. As she did Jaime quickly managed to get behind her adversary and tackled her face-first to the ground. With that she clambered atop Summer and sat on her butt, facing her socked feet.

"Nohohohohoho.....!" whimpered Summer as she realised her predicament, kicking her feet and already giggling in anticipation.

"Oh yes!" purred Jaime, reinvigorated, as she secured both of Summer's ankles in a headlock. She placed her index finger at the base of Summer's toes and slowly trailed it down the length of the foot to the heel, causing the girl to squirm wildly with barely-contained laughter. After repeating this a few times on each foot Jaime grabbed the top of Summer's pink sock and gently tugged at the soft fabric. Feeling her last line of defence gradually slipping away Summer tried desperately to kick her feet away but Jaime's grip was too tight. Pinned face down on the mat there was little Summer could do to shift Jaime. She couldn't even reach far enough behind to counter as Jaime had succeeded in doing previously.

In no time, both socks were off, exposing Summer's smooth bare feet.

"Hey Salt, what was that you said the last time we were captured and the Clown Prince gave you that truth serum to reveal your most ticklish spot?" asked Jaime casually, waving her fingers menacingly over the trapped feet. "That you have the most ticklish feet in the world? Tickle tickle tickle!"

Her fingers made contact and began to scribble rapidly up and down Summer's ultra sensitive right foot. Summer valiantly held firm for all of 3 seconds before dissolving into a fit of hysteria.

"NOOOOOHOHOHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" she screamed as she attempted to buck Jaime off of her but it was no good.

Jaime used her long nails to softly scratch along the length of Summer's arch, using all fingers in a clawing gesture while occasionally using just her index to tease her victim. It was taking all of Summer's resolve not to give in. As little as she could stand this she was still stubbornly proud and couldn't bear the thought of conceding defeat.

"C'mon Summer. Let's hear that laugh. Ticka-ticka-tickle. What about the toes?" Jaime wiggled a finger beneath Summer's toes, which instinctively scrunched up protectively but effectively trapped the probing finger in the process, perpetuating the torture. Summer threw back her head, the muscles in her face strained with laughter.

"NAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHASTAHAHAHAHAPNOHOHOMOHOHOREHAHAHAHAHAPLEHEHEHEHE HEASEHAHAHAHA"

"Was that surrender I hear?" cooed a beaming Chris as Mouse looked on, stunned by her older sister's predicament. "Did the great Summer Salt, junior detective, just say she's had enough?"

"YEHEHEHEHEHESTAHAHAHAHAPEHEHEIGIHIHIHIVEHAHAHAHAHAHAPHAHAHAHAHA" screamed Summer as Jaime slid a finger between her toes.

After a few more seconds Jaime finally relented and clambered to her feet. As she raised her fists in victory and hugged Chris in celebration Summer could only lay there panting as she contemplated her defeat, and her impending penalty, in disbelief. She was suddenly very much regretting having agreed to this stupid tournament.
"And to Jaime go the spoils!" exclaimed Chris, already happily contemplating getting her hands on the Salt sisters' bare soles. "Well Summer, it looks like you've got a lot of work to do. But don't worry, your good friends are here to help you raise your endurance." Nervous irritation flashed across Summer's face at her friend's mocking tone but Chris hardly seemed to notice. "Jaime, help me tie up our fearless leader."

The two victors each grabbed one of Summer's arms and hoisted her to her feet. They led her back across the hall to her own room and proceeded to tie her as they had Mouse: arms restrained over her head with her bare feet suspended just off the edge of the bed. Summer's toes, decorated with sky blue nail polish, flexed and curled restlessly at the thought of what was to come.

"Now" said Chris, allowing her enthusiasm to show. "We need to, uhh, 'train' as hard as we can to make sure these girls are in peak condition for our next adventure. But first we need to decide who will tickle who. Hmmm..."

She slipped out of her shoes to show off her feet.

"You know how many times these have been harassed since I entered this mansion, or since I've been chasing the Clown Prince?

She felt something wet and slippery, and PFFed, and squirmed. One of the cats have climbed up to lick it off her sole.

HIHEHEHAHAHANOOOuueeek! nnngh! mmph! pff

Summer grinned.
If one tongue crushed her so thoroughly, what is a dozen going to do...

She invited the other cats closer. The panting Pao-Ting was trying to catch her breath and bargain with her.

"Summer...You don't understand...What this is going to do to me, it's too..."

She ignored how Pao-Ting screamed as the cats started to REALLY get her feet, and walked out of the room. Paying no attention to the frantic sounds behind her, Summer stepped out of the mansion and looked around.
"But I wonder what happened to my nosy sister and my busybody friends?"

A helicopter suddenly burst out from among the trees! and rose into the sky. Two long ropes were hanging from it. On the end of the first there were two people tied together, and the second ended in a smaller one in a hog-tie.

From a loudspeaker she heard the Clown Prince's voice.

"You may have defeated me this time, Summer Salt, but we shall meet again! Until then, farewell!"

"Hahahanooo!" "Summerhaha save us!!!" the trio screamed as the helicopter disappeared over the hills.

Ignoring the wailing of Pao Ling from the floor above, Summer stood tall.

"Clown Prince, you might tickle my friends until their skin falls off today, but justice WILL prevail in the end! I'll catch you by my own hands no matter what even if I have to chase you naked to the end of the world!"

info.brief_description: Join a girl detective and friends as they search for clues at an abandoned mansion
info.description:
Summer Salt, girl detective, and friends sneak into the long abandoned old mansion near the swamp in order to find clues to the disappearance of several local school-children. Tricks, traps, tickling and trouble ensue!

Is it the work of criminal mastermind, The Clown Prince? Perhaps the ghost of the insane Ms. Hildegard Featherton, whom some say still haunts the premises? Maybe it’s Summer’s arch-rival, Pao-Ting, the Chinese girl-genius who delights in tormenting Summer and her friends?

Become Summer, or her little sister Mouse, their friends Jamie or Chris, or even be The Clown Prince or Pao-Ting in this tickling mystery interactive!
